attributes.action: That HM government publish the advice/evidence behind their COVID-19 plan.
attributes.background: HMG's COVID-19 response is internationally unique in that it believes that more limited action applied later can control the epidemic.  It is vitally important that the advice/evidence behind it be published so wider scrutiny can be applied to it by parliament and public.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301847

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
